Package org.xflatdb.xflat.convert

This package contains the conversion interface exposed by XFlat.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConversionService
    Provides conversions from one POJO to another.
    Converter<S,T>
    A converter converts a source object of type S to a target of type T.
    PojoConverter
    The interface for a PojoConverter.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultConversionService
    The default implementation of ConversionService.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConversionException
    The base class for conversion errors that occur in XFlat.
    ConversionNotSupportedException
    A subclass of ConversionException which indicates that the ConversionService.convert(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Class) method was called when the conversion was not supported.

Package org.xflatdb.xflat.convert Description

This package contains the conversion interface exposed by XFlat. XFlat provides a Conversion Service that uses registered Converters to convert objects to and from XML DOM representations.
